sew the horns between round 3/4 and 5 on the head then sew the ears just below the horns there should be 2 row inbetween then sew the body to the head sew the legs between round 6 and 9 of the body aligned with the ears check how it looks by using pins on the legs first before sewing them sew the legs on the side too so it stays close to the body see dotted line below sew the arms between round 11 and 14 of the body aligned with the legs sew the arms on the side too so it stays close to the body see dotted line below place the tail centered between the legs on round 5 now it is time to add the hair 28 29 hair add the hair just like you did on sheena giraffe or read more at page 14 you can use the same carton board that is 3 cm in height when you are done you will cut the hair to the length you want start on round 3 between the horns before you continue knot rest of the hair mark where to place them with pins it should start between the horns and the go downwards smaller and smaller to the body just below the neck cut the hair when you are done so it is even and not too long afterwards comb the hair with a needle or small fork to split the threads in the yarn now you will
